title: The lighthouse of Lindau, Germany
content: The lighthouse, the most southern of Germany, the Lighthouse of Lindau is located on Lake Constance, in Lindau. It was completed in 1856, when it replaced the station back light for the port on the Tower Mangtrum, built in 1230. The structure of 33 meters is quite unique among lighthouses because it also houses a clock huge that can be seen of the city.

figure.alt: Photo of the Lighthouse of Lindau
